reviewText: Love the show no problems found
Jack Webb is perfect as Sgt Friday.  Maybe in time I'll have more episodes.  Dragnet is a keeper.  And it is affordable from Amazon.com.
This was purchased as a birthday gift and therefore has not been watched by me. I am sure it is a great DVD as Jack Webb was really good in this tv series. I purchased all 6 DVD's for our friend.
I enjoyed the series when it was on TV. Watching it on DVD is a pleasant experience. Brings back old memories.

Dragnet, Volume 2 (Classic TV Series).  Four Dragnet episodes. The original titles and airdates for Dragnet Volume Two:

Episode One: THE BIG LITTLE JESUS (12/24/53)
Episode Two: THE BIG SEVENTEEN (11/6/52)
Episode Three: THE BIG PRODUCER (8/26/54)
Episode Four: THE BIG FRAME (4/22/54)

There are moments when the transfer is rough, but overall an excellent collection worth having.

If you're new to Classic Dragnet, Amazon also sells a set called DRAGNET (25 EPISODES) -- The best and most complete collection of the many first-run Dragnet sets available. The set features 25 Dragnet episodes on 5 one-sided DVDs in a fold-out package with an attractive slipcase.  Start there for to begin your collection.
